mapper.sql: id, userid, itype, num, businesstype, businesstid, btitle, originuserid, createtime, updatetime, remarker, detailid, detailtype, csourcetype,detailstatus
mapper.select: select u.*,o.receiptNum,o.receiptUser,o.receiptBank from user_income_detail u JOIN user_income_order o ON u.detailid = o.detailid WHERE u.detailid = #{detailid}
SELECT sum(num) from user_income_detail where csourcetype = #{csourcetype}
mapper.insert: insert into user_income_detail (id, userid, itype, num, businesstype, businesstid, btitle, originuserid, createtime, updatetime, remarker, detailid, detailtype, csourcetype) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businesstype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{businesstid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{btitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detailtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{csourcetype,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into user_income_detail
id,
userid,
itype,
num,
businesstype,
businesstid,
btitle,

remarker,

mapper.update:
update user_income_detail
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
itype = #{itype,jdbcType=CHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
businesstype = #{businesstype,jdbcType=CHAR},
businesstid = #{businesstid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
btitle = #{btitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
originuserid = #{originuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarker = #{remarker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailtype = #{detailtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
csourcetype = #{csourcetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
detailstatus = #{detailstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where detailid = #{detailid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_income_detail set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, itype = #{itype,jdbcType=CHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, businesstype = #{businesstype,jdbcType=CHAR}, businesstid = #{businesstid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, btitle = #{btitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originuserid = #{originuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarker = #{remarker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailid = #{detailid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, detailtype = #{detailtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, csourcetype = #{csourcetype,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
